pageContext.claim: “What's happened in New York is one of the saddest things I've ever seen happen to a city. Now it's happening in Chicago too. It's all Democrat-run cities. The only way it's going to come back is you're going to have to find a young version of Rudy Giuliani, otherwise it's not, because they have all these lefties in New York running for office and they use their criminal system.”
pageContext.analysis: The crime rate in New York City in 2020 was far below the levels when Giuliani was mayor.
